```{r}
df=read.csv("data/thyroid.csv")
head(df)
```

```{r}
#df$patient_gender=as.factor(as.character(df$patient_gender))
z=count(df,patient_gender)

z$patient_gender=as.character(z$patient_gender)
```

g

```{r}
 g<-ggplot(z, aes(x=patient_gender, y=n, fill=patient_gender) ) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity", width=1) +
  theme_bw() 


```

```{r}
fig <- ggplotly(g, 512,512)
fig
```
